4W9.F.summary: Pexip Holding ASA, a technology company that delivers a video-first meeting platform. Its platform simplifies video communication across borders, businesses, and platforms, enabling everyone to be seen, heard, and included. The company offers self-hosted and as-a-service deployment options for enterprise video conferencing built on the Pexip Infinity technology; and provides interoperability, including Microsoft Teams, Skype for Business, Google Hangouts Gateway interop, video system device registration, and a world-class meeting and calling service. The company has operations in the Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and the Americas. Pexip Holding ASA was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

ARR.OL.summary: Arribatec Solutions ASA, a software and consulting company, provides digital business solutions in Norway and internationally. Its solutions include Unit4 that provides services for driving digitalization in platforms to deliver digital experiences; xledger, a cloud based ERP system; Hypergene that provides enterprise performance management services ; 4human, a software as a solution that delivers HRM solutions to corporate business, government and public services, retail, education, museums, construction, and other sectors; Power BI, a collection of tools and services that facilitates the acquisition of data, data modeling, visualizations, and reports, as well as the distribution of analytical solutions; RamBase, cloud based ERP solution for manufacturing and wholesale industries; Arribatec Instipro3, a research platform; and Arribatec Certify, an application for daily management of housekeeping department, including digitalized cleanliness, as well as inspection processes for rooms, and public and exhibition areas. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

AYFIE.OL.summary: ayfie Group AS, a search company, provides knowledge discovery products and search solutions in the Nordics, Europe, and the United States. Its products are based on artificial intelligence enhanced solutions built on proprietary linguistics, machine learning, smart search, and text analytics. The company offers search and text analytics solutions for legal, compliance, finance, healthcare, and media. Its platform includes technologies from the fields of big data, insight engines, linguistic analysis, and content analytics. The company also provides text analytics solutions for eDiscovery, finance, publishing, and compliance. Its products include Locator for Knowledge Management that helps customers turn their corporate data into a true knowledge resource; Inspector that helps lawyers and others involved in litigation and investigations to identify the data important for their cases; and Document Analyzer that reads collections of documents to extract key information. The company's products are used by various industries ranging from construction companies to professional soccer clubs; and messaging and feature development focuses on serving law firms and legal service providers, as well as legal departments in corporations. It also offers service desk and knowledge base services. The company is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

B1T.F.summary: Techstep ASA provides digital workplace services in Norway and Sweden. It offers mobile hardware, service, support, and mobility consultancy services; and software as a service telecom expense management modules. The company also provides industry-leading cloud-based PBX solutions and enterprise mobility management services, including mobile security, system design, implementation, and mobile device management. Techstep ASA is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

B7Z.F.summary: Arribatec Solutions ASA, a software and consulting company, provides digital business solutions in Norway and internationally. Its solutions include Unit4 that provides services for driving digitalization in platforms to deliver digital experiences; xledger, a cloud based ERP system; Hypergene that provides enterprise performance management services ; 4human, a software as a solution that delivers HRM solutions to corporate business, government and public services, retail, education, museums, construction, and other sectors; Power BI, a collection of tools and services that facilitates the acquisition of data, data modeling, visualizations, and reports, as well as the distribution of analytical solutions; RamBase, cloud based ERP solution for manufacturing and wholesale industries; Arribatec Instipro3, a research platform; and Arribatec Certify, an application for daily management of housekeeping department, including digitalized cleanliness, as well as inspection processes for rooms, and public and exhibition areas. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

ELABS.OL.summary: Elliptic Laboratories A/S provides software-based artificial intelligence (AI) virtual smart sensors in Norway, China, South Korea, the United States, and Japan. It offers AI virtual sensors, such as security, inner beauty proximity, gesture; presence, and connection sensors for laptops, mobiles, and IoT and VR devices. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

HSCNF.summary: House Of Control Group AS develops and sells software as a service solutions. The company offers Complete Control, a solution which is used for managing contracts and assets, including the contracts' financial implications for accounting, budgeting, and reporting. It also provides solution for assisting companies in complying with IFRS 16 requirements. The company is based in HÃ¸vik, Norway.

HUDL.OL.summary: Huddlestock Fintech As, a financial technology company, provides end-to-end asset management solutions. It offers digital onboarding, and real-time trading and updates. The company is based in Stavanger, Norway.

IDXAF.summary: IDEX Biometrics ASA engages in the design, development, and sale of fingerprint identification and authentication solutions in Europe, the Middle East, Africa, the Americas, and Asia. The company offers IDEX Biometrics for the biometrics smart card market, including biometric fingerprint sensors for use in dual interface, contactless only, and contact only smart cards; biometric fingerprint modules for contact based smart cards; and on-card enrollment solutions for remote in-person enrollment. It primarily serves biometric payment card market, as well as offers its products and solutions for other markets, including access control, identification, healthcare, and the Internet of Things. The company was formerly known as Idex ASA and changed its name to IDEX Biometrics ASA in May 2019. IDEX Biometrics ASA was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

INFRO.OL.summary: Infront ASA provides market data and trading solutions for financial professionals primarily in Europe. The company operates Infront Solutions and Terminal; Vwd Group; and News and Other segments. Its Infront terminal products, which offer real-time market data, trading, news, and analytics for financial market participants. The company also provides data and feed, portfolio management and advisory, and regulatory compliance, as well as publication and distribution solutions. Infront ASA was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

KAHOOT-ME.OL.summary: Kahoot! AS operates a game-based learning platform in Norway, the United States, the United Kingdom, France, and Finland. Its platforms help to create, share, and play learning games. The company has approximately 1.2 billion participating players in approximately 200 countries. Kahoot has partnership with Zoom Video Communications, Inc. to offer the Kahoot! app for Zoom, enabling its users to access, host and play Kahoot! games directly from Zoom Meetings. Kahoot! AS was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

KAHOT.OL.summary: Kahoot! AS operates a game-based learning platform in Norway, the United States, the United Kingdom, France, and Finland. Its platforms help to create, share, and play learning games. The company has approximately 1.2 billion participating players in approximately 200 countries. Kahoot has partnership with Zoom Video Communications, Inc. to offer the Kahoot! app for Zoom, enabling its users to access, host and play Kahoot! games directly from Zoom Meetings. Kahoot! AS was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

The company has approximately 1.2 billion participating players in approximately 200 countries. Kahoot has partnership with Zoom Video Communications, Inc. to offer the Kahoot! app for Zoom, enabling its users to access, host and play Kahoot! games directly from Zoom Meetings. Kahoot! AS was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

MRCEL.OL.summary: Mercell Holding AS provides software platform for public e-tendering and procurement in the Nordic region. The company's software enables easy compliance with EU regulations for public buyers that are required by law to publish tenders through an e-tendering platform. Its two-sided SaaS marketplace platform also caters to the needs of the supply side and facilitates interaction between buyers and suppliers. The company also offers tender consulting services. Mercell Holding AS was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

Its platform simplifies video communication across borders, businesses, and platforms, enabling everyone to be seen, heard, and included. The company offers self-hosted and as-a-service deployment options for enterprise video conferencing built on the Pexip Infinity technology; and provides interoperability, including Microsoft Teams, Skype for Business, Google Hangouts Gateway interop, video system device registration, and a world-class meeting and calling service. The company has operations in the Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and the Americas. Pexip Holding ASA was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

PMG.OL.summary: Play Magnus AS operates in the chess industry worldwide. The company engages in the development of chess related applications, content, and events. It offers e-learning and entertainment services under the chess24, Chessable, CoChess, the Play Magnus App Suite, and the Champions Chess Tour brands. It also organizes chess competitions through online. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

PXPHF.summary: Pexip Holding ASA, a technology company that delivers a video-first meeting platform. Its platform simplifies video communication across borders, businesses, and platforms, enabling everyone to be seen, heard, and included. The company offers self-hosted and as-a-service deployment options for enterprise video conferencing built on the Pexip Infinity technology; and provides interoperability, including Microsoft Teams, Skype for Business, Google Hangouts Gateway interop, video system device registration, and a world-class meeting and calling service. The company has operations in the Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and the Americas. Pexip Holding ASA was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

SKI.OL.summary: Skitude Holding AS provides digital and mobile platforms for the monitoring, gamification, and sharing of skiing, snowboarding, and other outdoor activity experiences. It connects skiers and outdoor enthusiasts with mountain resorts through a range of smartphone apps, access to ski resorts through Skitude Instant Access, and the purchase of ski passes and other ski resort services. The company was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

TECH.OL.summary: Techstep ASA provides digital workplace services in Norway and Sweden. It offers mobile hardware, service, support, and mobility consultancy services; and software as a service telecom expense management modules. The company also provides industry-leading cloud-based PBX solutions and enterprise mobility management services, including mobile security, system design, implementation, and mobile device management. Techstep ASA is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

VOLUE.OL.summary: Volue AS offers digital platforms and solutions to solve the transition from fossil to renewable energy production worldwide. The company offers software, insights, and services for energy producers and energy traders for forecasting, optimization, production planning, and energy trading; tools that enable grid companies to design, maintain, control, analyze, and monitor the power grid; and flexible solutions for digital water management and helps automate processes and machines for the construction industry. It also provides solutions and technology for the municipalities, water, infrastructure construction, defense, transport, maritime, and offshore industries. The company was founded in 2020 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.
